scripts.dev: concurrently "cd backend && npm run backend:dev" "cd frontend && npm run start"
scripts.dev:e2e: concurrently "cd backend && npm run e2e" "cd frontend && npm start" "wait-on http://localhost:3001 && cd frontend && npm run e2e:dev"
scripts.build: cd frontend && rm -rf build && npm run build && cd ../backend && rm -rf build && cp -r ../frontend/build .
scripts.install:deps: concurrently "cd backend && npm install" "cd frontend && npm install"
